channel.title: CVE Feed for duongancol -- Boostify Header Footer Builder for Elementor
channel.description: The latest CVEs for duongancol -- Boostify Header Footer Builder for Elementor

item.title: CVE-2024-5006|2024-06-06T14:46:28.734Z -- duongancol -- boostify%20header%20footer%20builder%20for%20elementor
item.description: The Boostify Header Footer Builder for Elementor plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Stored Cross-Site Scripting via the ‘size’ parameter in all versions up to, and including, 1.3.2 due to insufficient input sanitization and output escaping. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers, with Contributor-level access and above, to inject arbitrary web scripts in pages that will execute whenever a user accesses an injected page.

item.description: The Boostify Header Footer Builder for Elementor plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Stored Cross-Site Scripting via the ‘size’ parameter in all versions up to, and including, 1.3.2 due to insufficient input sanitization and output escaping. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers, with Contributor-level access and above, to inject arbitrary web scripts in pages that will execute whenever a user accesses an injected page.
